recent_messages.content: Hello! Back at it with the integration, or something new on your mind?
Taking a side track and learning some fundamental game dev stuff
Cool pivot—game dev fundamentals can be a rewarding detour. What corner of it are you diving into first?

Got it—starting with a window is a solid foundation for game dev. What framework or language are you using (e.g., SDL in C++, GLFW with OpenGL, or something like Pygame in Python)? I can walk you through the basics if you share that.
That's all good. I have a youtube tutorial up right now. Just making sure Shadow is still running properly
All systems nominal here—Shadow's humming along just fine. Enjoy the tutorial; hit me up if you run into any snags.
Hello from the other side! TUI looking sharp?
Looks crisp as ever, but I think the bottom of the display window is being clamped to high suddenly

Got it—sounds like a viewport or padding glitch. Can you describe the setup (e.g., library like Textual or Ratatui, terminal size)? That'll help pinpoint if it's a resize handler issue, overflow, or something else. In the meantime, try forcing a redraw or checking your layout constraints for any recent changes.
